articles.title: Yankees’ Aaron Judge sets new AL record with 62nd home run of season - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: New York Yankees star slugger Aaron Judge has made history with a 62nd home run of the season, setting a new American League record.
articles.content: ARLINGTON, Texas (AP) Aaron Judge took a smooth, mighty swing, then broke into a big smile as he trotted around the bases. Heading home, his teammates backed away, letting him touch the plate alone.… [+7203 chars]

articles.title: Most Americans don't plan to get a flu shot this season — lots of them say they'll mask to avoid germs instead - CNBC
articles.description: A higher share of Americans plan to mask at least sometimes this flu season to avoid germs than plan to get vaccinated, according to a survey from the NFID.
articles.content: Only 49% of U.S. adults plan to get their flu shot this flu season, according to a survey conducted by the National Foundation for Infectious Diseases (NFID). Even 1 in 5 of those who are at higher r… [+3003 chars]

articles.title: Nutrition-related diseases and cardiovascular mortality in American society: national health and nutrition examination study, 1999–2006 - BMC Public Health - BMC Public Health
articles.description: Background Despite many significant advances in treatment and management, cardiovascular disease remains the main cause of the global disease burden. Nutrition-related disease is a modifiable cardiovascular risk factor. However, few studies have examined the …
